recipes.cookingMethod: 1. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. 2. Add the beef and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. 3. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside. 4. Add the onion and mushrooms to the skillet and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. 5. Add the beef broth and bring to a boil. 6. Reduce the heat and simmer for 10 minutes. 7. Stir in the sour cream and beef. 8. Cook until heated through, about 5 minutes.

1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. 2. Combine the breadcrumbs and Parmesan cheese in a shallow dish. 3. Coat the chicken in the breadcrumb mixture. 4. Place the chicken in a greased baking dish. 5. Bake for 25 minutes. 6. Pour the spaghetti sauce over the chicken. 7. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. 8. Bake for an additional 10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

1. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. 2. Meanwhile, combine the basil, garlic, pine nuts, and Parmesan cheese in a food processor. 3. Process until finely chopped. 4. Drain the pasta and reserve 1 cup of the pasta water. 5. Return the pasta to the pot and add the pesto. 6. Toss to coat, adding reserved pasta water as needed. 7. Serve immediately.
